thread.title: Great boutique hotel in Times Square
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel in Times Square - Review of Hotel Mela, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Melissa M
title: Great boutique hotel in Times Square
text:
This was our third stay at the Hotel Mela.
Great location , great prices, clean and good service. There are not a lot of extras but when in NYC for a long weekend who hangs out in their hotel?
Upper floors are nice and quiet.
Would stay there again and would recommend.
